title: Give Your Heart A Break
lyrics: Intro: - - - The day I first met you you told me you’ll But  now i that know fear i get you is what Now here we are so close yet so far Having not passed the test When will you realize baby I’m not like Don’t wanna break your heart wanna give your heart a break I know you’re scared as wrong that you might make a mistake There’s just one life to live to wait to waste So let me give your heart a break Your heart a break heart a break Your heart a break  On Sunday you wen thome alone I called your cell phone my love but you did not reply The world is ours if we want it We can take it if you There’s no tur---ning back now Don’t wanna break your heart wanna give your heart a break I know you’re scared as wrong that you might make a mistake There’s just one life to live to wait to waste So let me give your heart a break Your heart a break heart a break Your heart a break This is so much you can take give your heart a break heart a break Your heart a break When your lips are on my lips then our hearts beat as one But you slip out of my finger tips Every time you  run!!!! Don’t wanna break your heart wanna give your heart a break I know you’re scared as wrong that you might make a mistake There’s just one life to live to wait to waste So let me give your heart a break Cause you've been hurt before I see it in your eyes You try to smile it away Don’t wanna break your heart the ache the ache So let me give your heart a break Your heart a break heart a break Your heart a break This is so much you can take give your heart a break heart a break Your heart a break  The day you I told me first met you you’ll never fall in love
